statements: UPDATE customer_data SET phone_number='123-456-7890', state='Texas', income=75000 WHERE customer_id=101;

UPDATE customer_data SET income = 50000.00, purchase_history = '{}' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_data SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', city = 'New York', zip_code = '10001' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE customers SET name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET amount=99.99, product_name='New Product' WHERE purchase_id=101;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE purchases SET product_name = 'New Product', amount = 99.99 WHERE customer_id = 456 AND purchase_date = '2022-05-10';
